text: From wedding crashing to champagne delivery. Taylor Swift has made her mark on a fair share of weddings, and what she did for one lucky couple in New York on Saturday, March 17, is no exception. Imagine Edward and Margaret McNoble ’ s surprise when The Carltun at Eisenhower Park in East Meadow, New York, informed them that a bottle of champagne was waiting for them with a special note from Swift attached. “ Rumor has it you might be using my song in your wedding celebration which makes me so happy! Here ’ s to this amazing day of your continuing love story. Love, Taylor, ” the songstress wrote. “ When we got to the wedding venue, they told us, ‘ There [ is ] a special gift upstairs for you from a very special person, ’ ” the New York -
